QuestData.Title: Extending Our Coverage
QuestData.Description: The Klaxxi'va hear another paragon. His cries are weak and lost in darkness. The signal must be strengthened.$b$bThere is a tower in Amberglow Hollow that has been silent for many years. It must sing; the Klaxxi demand it!$b$bThis time I will go with you. You will help me repair it.$b$bTake the resonating crystal and meet me in Amberglow.
QuestData.LogDescription: Activate the Resonating Beacon in Amberglow Hollow.

Objectives.Objective: Use the Resonating Crystal on the Idle Beacon
